name: Chicken Stir Fry
instructions: Cook chicken strips in oil, then add vegetables, soy sauce, garlic and ginger. Stir fry until cooked.

name: Pancakes
instructions: Mix dry ingredients, then add milk and egg. Cook on a hot griddle until golden.

name: Beef Tacos
instructions: Cook beef with seasoning, fill taco shells with beef and toppings.

name: Veggie Soup
instructions: Simmer chopped vegetables in broth until tender.

name: Pizza
instructions: Spread sauce on dough, top with cheese and basil, then bake until crust is golden.

name: Chocolate Chip Cookies
instructions: Cream butter and sugar, mix in eggs, then dry ingredients and chips. Bake spoonfuls until golden.

name: Fish Tacos
instructions: Cook fish with seasoning, fill shells with fish, cabbage, and toppings.

name: Chicken Caesar Salad
instructions: Toss lettuce with dressing, top with grilled chicken, croutons and parmesan.

name: French Toast
instructions: Dip bread in egg mixture and fry in butter until golden on both sides.
